Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,ALG12-congenital disorder of glycosylation
What is (are) recurrent hydatidiform mole ?,"Recurrent hydatidiform mole occurs when women have at least two abnormal pregnancies described as hydatidiform moles. A hydatidiform mole occurs early in pregnancy when an embryo does not fully develop and the placenta develops abnormally.
